# Steps to reproduce
```powershell 
powershell title bar right click -> properties -> select cusor shape other than legacy style
```
# Expected behavior
```powershell 
**cursor shapes** 
- Legacy Style 
- Underscore
- Vertical Bar
- Empty Box
- Solid Box
The above cursor shapes can be switched at will.
```
# Actual behavior
```powershell 
only legacy style is valid
```
# Environment data
```powershell 
System environment : win7 or win8 or win10
**powershell 1.0 , 2.0 ......7.0   and 7.1.0-preview.2 All of the above versions have this problem.**
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      7.1.0-preview.2
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    7.1.0-preview.2
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.19041
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```
